Do you find it discouraging when the market drops or do you feel confident that you will be okay?

Unless you're talking about an enormous and sustained downturn, most of the time if you wait long enough you will recover, so I tend to be optimistic that will occur. The market is volatile by nature, you have to be patient.
So would you recommend that people invest if they have a little bit of expendable income?
Absolutely! Many funds now allow small investments, and so long as you don't try the high risk funds, making a little profit will usually encourage you to invest more.
Oh wonderful! How would you suggest one get started?
I would do some research on the internet before beginning. There are some pretty good sources of information out there.
I agree, I have many many years of experience in the stock market so it shouldn't be too hard for me.
Meat and wine? That doesn't seem particularly healthy for body-building.
In 1910 a man named Eugen Sandow is said to be the first modern western body builder and used dietary control to enhance muscle growth.
Interesting, how much muscle have you grown since you started body building?
In October 199e the dietary supplement the health and ed act came signed into practice.
Did that legislation impact body builders like yourself?
Body Builder Earle Liederman was in favor of Beef extract or beef juice as a way to initiate muscle recovery.
That sounds like it could really help improve your body for body-building.
Bodybuilding isn't something that I really care about or enjoy.

its really heart breaking. i'm so glad to have made good memories. it would be tragic if i had regrets

You are so right. It can make all the difference.

i just recently went bowling on a date, and I think my score was closer to 80!! Are there any effective strategies to get better at bowling?
It certainly depends on the type of bowling game you are playing. Some varieties include target bowling, ten-pin, nine-pin and duckpin. I think the best advice is to keep your arm straight.

Ten-pin is the most popular, and it is what you played on your bowling date. Most bowling games descend from a European lawn game called Skittles though!
Skittles, as in the candy skittles, oh goodness! What did that game consist of?
So I think it consists of throwing a baton at some pins and the max score is 50. People still play it in the United Kingdom and Ireland, but I have never played it.

A perfect score is 300. It is my life dream to bowl a 300 one day, but I doubt I'll ever be able to do it.
